name: SimultaneousGesture
desc: A gesture containing two gestures that can happen at the same time with neither of them preceding the other.

items.name: init(First, Second)
items.desc: Creates a gesture with two gestures that can receive updates or succeed independently of each other.

items.name: var first: First
items.desc: The first of two gestures that can happen simultaneously.

items.name: var second: Second
items.desc: The second of two gestures that can happen simultaneously.

items.name: typealias Body
items.desc: The type of gesture representing the body of Self.

items.name: struct Value
items.desc: The value of a simultaneous gesture that indicates which of its two gestures receives events.

declaration: @frozen struct SimultaneousGesture<First, Second> where First : Gesture, Second : Gesture
